Yourgene Health推出Iona Care+非侵入性产前测试服务领先的国际分子诊断小组Yourgene Health（Novacyt Companies的一部分）今天宣布，英国的遗传状况全面的非侵入性产前筛查Iona®Care+推出了Iona®Care+。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/yourgene-health-launches-iona-care2b-non-inon-inon-innon-invasive-prenatatal-prenatatal-pesting-service.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/yourgene-health-launches-iona-carees-iona-care2b-non-inon-inon-innon-invasive-prenatatal-prenatatal-pesting-service.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=11EFE8D2-0162-4B7E-975D-609394CF7548 Thu, 13 Feb 2025 07:22:00 -0500 Yourgene Health launches IONA Care+ non-invasive prenatal testing service
Selkirk Pharma介绍Clinfast™，以加快临床试验的填充/完成Selkirk Pharma，Inc。是一家私人持有的美国药品制造商，专门从事可注射药物（包括疫苗和生物疗法）的填充和饰面，今天宣布推出Clinfast™，这是一家旨在帮助临床舞台生物技术和制药公司的范式转换服务临床试验用品的快速填充/完成过程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/selkirk-pharma-indroduces-clinfaste284a2-to-exex- exexite-exexite-fillfillfinish-for-for-clinical-trials.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/selkirk-pharma-indrododuces-clinfaste284a2-to-expedite-fillfillfillfillfinish-fillfinish-fill-clin--for-clinical-trials.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6438BE59-B39C-42AC-823A-7195DE7A5ED8 Thu, 13 Feb 2025 07:12:00 -0500 Selkirk Pharma introduces ClinFAST™ to expedite fill/finish for clinical trials
研究表明，早期的育儿增强了幼儿的发展大约60年来，所谓的“三岁神话”在日本普遍的智慧一直认为，母亲应该在家中抚养孩子，直到三岁才能健康发展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/research-shows-early-childcare-boost-development-indddlers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250213/research-shows-shows-early-childcare-boosts-development-in-toddlers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=635b93d2-0778-48b0-48b0-af48-7b48-7b5c71b617e6 Thu, 13 Feb 2025 07:11:00 -0500 Research shows early childcare boosts development in toddlers
